30th DCSS win: Octopode Cinder Acolyte of Jiyva I successfully ascended with my 30th win in the Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup roguelike, playing an Octopode Cinder Acolyte of Jiyva. This was a really fun run, relying on Statue Form and Dragon’s Call by the end. Dragon’s Call, in particular, seems like one of the most powerful, if not the most powerful, spells. The morgue file from CKO is included below:… gamesdcss https://benleskey.com/blog/opca_win https://benleskey.com/blog/opca_win Tue, 28 Mar 2023 12:00:00 +0000
Raymon Ortega #2: Battery Heist and a Sweet Chariot On foot Last we left Raymon, he had scrounged together some meagre gear and a sturdy spear and was about to hike north west toward the refugee center. Striking out across the field, Raymon headed toward the regional dump near the evac shelter. It wasn’t far as the crow flies, though not connected by road anywhere nearby. This is some form of otherworldly hound. Lean and hungry-looking, its twisted red flesh is stretched tightly across its misshapen, angular frame. Loping grotesquely along, its unusually long neck stretches forward, its skull-like head near the ground as it sniffs out its prey.… gamesletsplaycddacdda_raymon https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_2 https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_2 Tue, 31 Jan 2023 12:00:00 +0000 _
